Reason: The configuration option LOB_TIMEOUT is performance-sensitive because it directly impacts the timeout duration for large object (LOB) operations in the h2 software project. A shorter timeout may lead to incomplete or failed operations, while a longer timeout may result in increased resource consumption and potential delays in overall system performance. Therefore, any change in the value of LOB_TIMEOUT can significantly affect the system's performance by either improving or degrading the efficiency of LOB operations.
